channel.title: Can I fix how
channel.description: Fast it saves the characters information? Like right now every time I do a reset too add new items in it rollsback hella far, so Im wondering if I could speed up the saving character process. Also if I do speed it up how much is the lag increase on the server if there is any?

item.title: Can I fix how
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Well when you do a reset without properly shutting down the server is doesn’t save the accounts. The account saving speed (shouldn’t) be a problem.

Read full topic
